scripts.start:all: concurrently "cd cms && NODE_ENV=production npm run start" "cd main && npm run start" "cd websocket && npm run dev"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "cd cms && npm run develop" "cd main && npm run dev" "cd websocket && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: cd main && npm install && cd ../cms && npm install && cd ../websocket && npm install
